definitions.title: n.pl.
definitions.body: indecl. an eighty;—without other num.: sq. sg. [[שָׁנָה]] Ps 90:10 + 4 t., [[אִישׁ]] 2Ki 10:24, Je 41:5; sq. n.pl. 2Ch 26:17, Ezr 8:8, Ct So 6:8; n.om. 2Ki 6:25, 1Ch 15:9; c. other num., card.: [[אֶלֶף]] ´[[שׁ]]: Nu 2:9 + 6t.; ´[[שׁ]]: foll. units Ge 5:25 + 4 t.; precedes, Ge 16:16 + 4 t.; foll. 100 etc. 1Ch 25:7 + 6 t.; precedes, Ge 5:26 + 2 t.; ordin., [[שָׁנָךְ]] ´[[בִּשׁ]]: [[וְאַרְבַּע מֵאוֹת שָׁנָה לָ]] 1Ki 6:1.
